item.title: Devops "Charmander-to-Charmeleon" bootcamp
item.description: ü§î What is this about? A 3 month hands-on intro to devops. ü§ì What am I going to learn? Building a simple RESTful API to perform CRUD operations Deploying web applications on cloud VM instances Dockerizing web applications and deploying them using docker-compose How to perform load testing Bulding continous integration and continous deployment pipelines Learning about horizontal vs verticial scalability and load balancing Very brief intro to Kubernetes #Docker #docker-compose #Kubernetes #Ubuntu #Github actions #Artillary #Postgresql #Django #Flask #Nginx #AWS EC2 #GIT ‚è≥ What is my expected commitment?
